FrageText.de: Dürfen Sie das Fahrzeug des Straßendienstes überholen?
FrageText.en: Are you permitted to overtake the road-service vehicle?
FrageText.hr: Smijete li pretjecati vozilo službe na cestama?
FrageText.tr: Bu karayolları hizmet aracını sollayabilir misiniz?

de.Text: Ja, ich darf links oder rechts überholen

en.Text: No, I am not permitted to overtake
Yes, I am permitted to overtake on the left
Yes, I am permitted to overtake on the right
Yes, I am permitted to overtake on the left or right

hr.Text: Da, smijem pretjecati s lijeve strane
Da, smijem pretjecati s desne strane
Da, smijem pretjecati s lijeve ili desne strane

sl.Text: Da, smem prehiteti po levi ali desni
